Tooltips

Both functions are a means of adding help text to HTML components. Tooltips appear on hover. To add tooltips to text first wrap the text in a span() tag element.

Arguments

.tag

A tag element.

text

The tooltip text.

placement

One of "top", "right", "bottom", or "left" specifying what side of the tag element the tooltip appears on.
